title: How do I prevent personal data from being leaked from my phone?
answer:
Some third-party apps may allow personal data on your phone to be leaked or deleted. You can download security apps for your phone which will scan the device and remove third-party malware. This will help keep your personal data safe.

Your personal data is at risk when you use Wi-Fi hotspots in locations such as shopping centers, hotels, restaurants and cafes. Please take care when connecting to such hotspots.
keywords: leak, steal, protect, personal information, prevent leaks, confidential data
